title: ayyanE ATkoL
sahitya:
ayyanE ATkoL meyyanE enai muttu murugayyanE kaNNi 


anupallavi



1:  sheyyanE nin ishai dikkengum paravattakka vAkkanugrahittuccittu muttu murug-
 caraNam 2    santamighunda kanda gAnAmudam tA brahmAnandak-kanda shonda murug-
 caraNam 3    konkulAm kavi kunjradAsan anjcorkkaruL aindaru guru tiru murug-
